item.title: Comment on That was then, this is now by Pillow Lasers
item.description:
So we’re not Bayesians anymore?

Maybe he’s changed since 2008, maybe we learned more about him since 2008.

item.title: Comment on The economic powers of the HHS secretary by Counting down for Jan 20th…
item.description:
Whilst I’m sure come inauguration, when the rubber meets the road, some thinking may happen, let’s not kid ourselves that anything like “a serious ponder” is going on at the moment:

It’s about fealty, preferably with an added dose of self-humiliation at renouncing earlier criticism, at the feet of the king.
